ine5633.eightpuzzlesolver.model

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • ine5633.eightpuzzlesolver.model.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a node in a graph
    stores the :
    - state of the board,
    - the level in the graph,
    - the cost of this node,
    - the reference to the parent node
    @author feekosta
